:: VAMPRAH ::

"BY... THE PIT"

Said Vamprah happily, afther those word she calm down and think her 
next movement. Aparently she had had bad luck by second time when 
Wheeljack got her probe... But it was a part in her plan.

Vamprah flied in robot mode towars one of several cave's exit, in one 
of her hands she had a sort of cage, inside, a big robot  bat.

This bat was diferent to others, its was made with a dark metal and 
in bat's forehead showed  Vamprah's sign: a open craw, it seemed 
ready to catch.

Vamprah took the bat off the cage, she kissed it and said "Find 
Megatron".
 
**********************
:: Vamprah/unknow male bot::

Vamprah returned at her ship and went to the control room. 

"Turning  Echo System on" Said Vamprah

"Echo system on line and operational" answered the computer

"Spread bat-probes in secor Sarya... Disntance among porbes: 50 
miles..." Said Vamprah

A big shadow appeared behind Vamprah, as soon as she felt him, she 
said "Don't worry, Sector Sarya is far a way where we are... They 
can't find us... It's time to have a meeting with Zardus"
